abstract.text: Creates an input port through which the client may receive incoming MIDI messages from any MIDI source.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: The client to own the newly-created port.
The MIDIReadProc which will be called with incoming MIDI, from sources connected to this port.
On successful return, points to the newly-created MIDIPort.
After creating a port, use MIDIPortConnectSource to establish an input connection from any number of sources to your port.
readProc will be called on a separate high-priority thread owned by CoreMIDI.

abstract.text: Communicate with MIDI devices such as hardware keyboards and synthesizers.
An object that maintains per-client state.
Creates a virtual destination in a client.
Creates a virtual destination in a client.
Creates an input port through which the client may receive incoming MIDI messages from any MIDI source.

Creates an input port through which the client may receive incoming MIDI messages from any MIDI source.
Adds a MIDI event to a MIDIPacketList.
Prepares a MIDIPacketList to be built up dynamically.
A MIDI connection that a client maintains.
Distributes incoming MIDI from a source to the client input ports which are connected to that source.
Creates a virtual source in a client.
A reference to a CFString object.
A pointer for accessing and manipulating data of a specific type.
A raw pointer for accessing and manipulating untyped data.
